faq.q1: In our hospital we have mechanical ventilators of different brands and models. Can we use Vent Support?
faq.r1: Vent Support is a constantly growing application. We have a base catalog of compatible fan brands and models that continually add devices. In the event that the brand / model they wish to work with is still not in our catalog, a new link must be developed, this process is usually carried out jointly between the ventilator manufacturer, Vent Support and the hospital concerned
faq.q2: Patient information must be safeguarded at all times. How does Vent Support guarantee data protection?
faq.r2: Since its inception, Vent Support integrates the best standards in data protection. We have numerous security features to safeguard patient data. Vent Support does not store personal data or medical history information that identifies the identity of a patient by itself. All data travels and is stored encrypted
faq.q3: Is historical patient data stored in the cloud?
faq.r3: Consulting information on the patient's respiratory flow in real time from the web platform is one of the main features of Vent Support. We have the flexibility to adapt the application to a hybrid cloud scheme or, if necessary, -on premise-
faq.q4: What if the hospital does not have internet in the intensive care room?
faq.r4: Vent Support does not need an internet connection to work, it is highly recommended to explore all the features of the application but it is possible to work in rooms without internet access
faq.q5: What is the Vent Support hiring process?
faq.r5: Please contact a representative at this link for more commercial information
faq.q6: How does Vent Support help in the treatment of patients with Covid?
faq.r6: Vent Support provides complete historical information on the patient's respiratory flows. Analyzing information about the patient's condition over a long period of time generates better recommendations and provides doctors with enough information to make the best decision in the treatment of the patient. With a high demand in emergency rooms, health personnel are overwhelmed in continuously monitoring all patients. With Vent Support they can receive automatic alerts of patients who suddenly change their status, in addition to visualizing their historical evolution and thus supporting their treatmen
faq.q7: How long does it take for a patient's information to be transferred to the web platform?
faq.r7: It depends on the internet access facilities provided by the hospital. In ideal situations with a wireless internet connection the data will be reflected on the website one second after being collected by the fan
faq.q8: In which hospitals has Vent Support been tested?
faq.r8: Vent Support has been tested in intensive care rooms in several countries.
